name: who-is-request
description: Represents a BACnet Who-Is request, used to discover devices on the network, optionally within a specified device instance range.

fields.name: device-instance-range-low-limit
fields.description: Optional lower limit of the device instance range to search for.

fields.name: device-instance-range-high-limit
fields.description: Optional upper limit of the device instance range to search for.
